message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been carefully crafted to meet the highest standards. It comes with a variety of features designed to enhance your daily experience. Considering its quality and benefits, I would like to offer it to you for $85. I believe this price reflects the value we put into creating this product and I'm confident it will be a great addition to your collection.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the features you've highlighted, $85 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this point. I'm willing to pay $70 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. Considering the cost of production and the value it offers, I am willing to negotiate further. Therefore, I propose an adjusted price of $75 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. However, $75 is still a little higher than I'm aiming for. How about $72? I believe this price is fair considering the value I'm placing on the product and allows for a reasonable profit for you.

I appreciate your feedback, Bob. After considering your proposal and my costs, I am willing to offer the product at $73. This price reflects a fair compromise between the value I place on the product and the value you see in it. I hope this suggestion will help us reach a satisfactory agreement.
